Class Score

  • java.lang.Object
    • Score

  • public class Score
extends java.lang.Object
    This program controls the scoring for the game once the final hand is reached. CPSC 224-01 Spring 2020 HW #2 No sources to cite;

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int findFullHouse()
      Finds if there is a full house in the final hand.
      static void findMaxOfAKind()
      Searches the final hand for the highest recurrence of a number
      static void findMaxStraight()
      Iterates through final hand and looks for the longest straight
      static void findYahtzee()
      iterates through final hand and looks for a yahtzee
      static int totalAllDice()
      Totals the value of the final hand of die
      static void totalOfEachNumScore()
      Totals the quantity of each number of the die and outputs the score

      • findFullHouse

        public static int findFullHouse()
        Finds if there is a full house in the final hand.
        Returns:
        0 if there is no full house, 25 if a full house was found
